title: FYI, Rapid Antigen Tests May Give More False Negatives With Omciron
content:
1. FYI, Rapid Antigen Tests May Give More False Negatives With Omciron  ScienceAlert
  2. White House team reacts to FDA report on rapid COVID test sensitivity: PCR, antigen tests 'critical tools'  Fox News
  3. Coronavirus risk calculations get harder as a study suggests rapid tests may be less effective at detecting omicron  The Washington Post
  4. FDA says Covid-19 antigen tests may be less sensitive to Omicron variant, but they're still an important tool  CNN
  5. Abbott issues statement on rapid tests following FDA findings on reliability  WMTW Portland
contentSnippet:

FDA says Covid-19 antigen tests may be less sensitive to Omicron variant, but they're still an important tool  CNN

localize.title: 参考までに、迅速抗原性検査では、オムシロンで偽陰性が多く出る可能性があります。
请注意，使用Omciron的快速抗原测试可能会出现更多的假阴性反应
